function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly infectious virus transmitted through droplets from infected individuals.","Impact":"Severe symptoms such as pneumonia, pulmonary edema, and organ failure leading to death.","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures, promote proper hygiene, and use personal protective equipment (PPE).","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technologies, and telemedicine.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Government health agencies, healthcare facilities, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Rapid global spread of the virus resulting in a pandemic.","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, increased mortality rates, and economic disruption.","Mitigation":"Enforce travel restrictions, conduct widespread testing, and implement social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, telecommuting tools, and remote healthcare monitoring.","People":"Global population, travelers, and individuals in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Government authorities, international health organizations, and travel industry stakeholders."},{"Description":"High number of confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions.","Impact":"Strain on local healthcare resources, higher risk of exposure, and potential for localized outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Enhance healthcare capacity, provide adequate medical supplies, and enforce localized lockdowns.","Technologies":"Healthcare supply chain management systems, remote patient monitoring, and data analytics for resource allocation.","People":"Residents in affected regions, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Local health authorities, government agencies, and medical facilities."}]}
